billhistory.lastaction: 03/06/2017 S Referred to Health & Human Services
billhistory.caption: Relating to the creation of the Texas Behavioral Health Executive Council and to the continuation and transfer of the regulation of sex offender treatment providers, psychologists, marriage and family therapists, professional counselors, chemical dependency counselors, and social workers to the Texas Behavioral Health Executive Council; providing civil and administrative penalties; authorizing a fee.
billhistory.authors: Hinojosa | Nichols | Schwertner | Taylor, Van | Watson
